Guard.effect: Choose a non-Guard card and choose another player. If that player has that card, he or she is out of the round.
Guard.name: Guard

Baron.effect: You and another player secretly compare hands. The player with the lower value is out of the round.
Baron.name: Baron

Handmaiden.effect: Until your next turn, ignore all effects from other player's cards.
Handmaiden.name: Handmaiden

Prince.effect: Choose any player(including yourself) to discard his or her hand and draw a new one.
Prince.name: Prince

King.effect: Trade hands with another player of your choice.
King.name: King

Countess.effect: If you have this card and the King or Prince in your hand, you must play this card.
Countess.name: Countess

Princess.effect: If you discard this card, you are out of the round.
Princess.name: Princess
